short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you a text area where you can put lots and lots of search terms and then add the results of that search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are using Instructure's Canvas software, and you create a lot of quizzes from Item Banks, you might find it tedious to type a search, press (+), clear the search, type in another search and so on.

This extension modifies that Item Bank screen to give you a text area where you can copy-and-paste a long list, one search term per line. It will then automate the search, selection and clearing for you.
